alert.note: Alert for Chukchi Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 07 at 1:52PM AKST until November 09 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Buildings along the lagoon and near the airstrip of Kivalina may be inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wave run up of 3 to 5 feet above the normal high tide line is expected. Any shore ice near the coast may get washed up on shore. Strong southeast winds will shift south to southwest on Tuesday and continue through Tuesday night.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
